answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Ruth – I hope the following is helpful:
Chesapeake, VA - Guide to Opening and Operating a New Business
http://www.cityofchesapeake.net/Government/City-Departments/Departments/Comm-Rev/Business-Services/Opening-Operating-a-Business---Tax---Licensing/Guide-to-Opening-and-Operating-a-New-Business.htm
NYC - Business Incentives Guide 
http://www.nycedc.com/resource/business-incentives-guide 
Fresno, CA - Fresno Start Up Guide Spanish and English
http://www.fresno.gov/Businesses/StartingABusiness/Default.htm 
Seattle, WA – Starting a Business in Seattle
http://www.seattle.gov/economicdevelopment/business_start.htm 
Pam
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450 Office
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org

answers.author: Ruth Buchanan, MBA, CEcD
answers.text:
Hi Pam, 
Yes, the information you shared are very helpful. Thanks so much! 
- Ruth

author: Ruth Buchanan, MBA, CEcD
text: Hello. We are looking to create a user-friendly guide to new, expanding, or relocating businesses in our city. We would very much appreciate learning about best practices from the members. We envision a 'one-stop shop' booklet or webpage or collection of webpages perhaps with a flow chart. We look forward to your inputs. Thank you.
title: Permitting Guidebook, Primer, or Checklist that works
